law.catch_line: Establishment of separate performance standards for existing coal-fired and natural gas-fired electric generating units.

text.section:
In developing and implementing any plan to control emissions of carbon dioxide, the cabinet shall establish separate standards of performance for carbon dioxide emissions in accordance with:
KRS 224.20-142 for existing coal-fired electric generating units; and
KRS 224.20-143 for existing natural gas-fired electric generating units.
Performance standards shall be adjusted on a case-by-case basis in accordance with KRS 224.20-144 and shall be implemented in accordance with KRS 224.20-146.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2014.
